appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: The new tab page in Metro style. Awesome startpage for youre browser. All Apps, pages in one place. Customable and awesome
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

permissions.message: This widget needs additional permissions to access  $perms$

tip1.message: click on me to enlarge me and get some starting infos

tip2.message: click on the settings icon to open the settings menu :)

tip3.message: make an right click to an tile and change settings

tip4.message: scroll to the right and have a look at your installed apps

tip5.message: Drag and drop bookmarks direct into the new tile form ;)

tip6.message: Thanks for installing iStart :) I hope you have much fun with it

tip7.message: If you like you can share iStart with your friends. This would be awesome.

tip8.message: If you find some misspellings in the app, send me please an email: kayolvier82@gmail.com :-) Thanks

faqmovebody.message: Drag and Drop tiles around. Simply click with the left mouse button on an tile, hold it, and move the tile around.

faqaddbody.message: Click on the settings icon on the right top of iStart, and choose from the menu 'add new link/favorite' and drag and drop your bookmark into the form or typing it by hand.

faqrecentlytitle.message: Where find i the recently closed tabs?

faqrecentlybody.message: For iStart we have developed an extension which performs this function. View Recently Closed Tabs. To add this feature iStart simply install the extension from the Chrome Web Store:recently closed plugin restart chrome and even the recently closed tabs are back where they should be.

supportBugFeatureBody.message: No problem, you can use the form in the webstore to report an bug or request for an feature you like, go to the feedback form in the chrome Webstore Your Bugreport or feature request helps me a lot to make iStart much better for you

supportShareMeBody.message: If you like iStart, share iStart with your friends, or rate iStart in the store with 5 Stars , this gives me a lot of motivation to build better features and new cool stuff for you. Thanks a lot.
